column5: I don‚Äôt know why I‚Äôm getting downvoted. I just wanted to have a conversation with y‚Äôall, my fellow Michiganders. I don‚Äôt have anyone in my life to talk to about this stuff. Thank you to those that have responded. It‚Äôs given me things to look up.

I love getting film rolls because I have film cameras or a disposable camera and going around my city taking pictures by myself. Either getting a coffee or lunch at a local place and enjoying the scenery. I have a lot of walking trails and I live in a walkable city though.
I‚Äôll just let the mods decide. I read the rules before I posted and I think it‚Äôs right. I related it to Michigan which is what the rules said to do and I wanted a Michigan perspective.
Okay my bad. I just wanted a discussion. I can take it down though. I didn‚Äôt know where else to post it. Maybe r/politics?
Yeah. Do you have an opinion on who you think he‚Äôs going to pick?
Yeah me too. This is a weird election year.

[here you go.](https://www.google.com/search?q=donald+trump+next+to+obama&client=safari&hl=en-us&prmd=niv&sxsrf=ALeKk03rqBBHoe7onA1s80octEVETKEO3w:1589861655783&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwiDl_CZiL_pAhVul3IEHf4HBosQ_AUoAnoECAwQAg&biw=375&bih=553)
If you look at pictures of him on the same level as Obama they‚Äôre the same height and Obama is 6‚Äô1‚Äù
r/sandwiches would like this I think!

These comments about people not getting hazard pay already and don‚Äôt have health insurance make me sick. These fucking billionaires should be ashamed of themselves. Blood on their hands. Eat the fucking rich.

God that comment. It‚Äôs so frustrating. I wish I couldn‚Äôt drink that much. Trust me. But I honestly feel blessed that I do drink that much. People go their whole lives drinking but they don‚Äôt drink like us so they continue to do it in social settings and they still don‚Äôt feel that great. I‚Äôm happy that I can‚Äôt have it so I just feel well rested, full of energy and I know my limit of when I need to leave places or need me time.

I‚Äôve been having that happen too! I feel very blessed by those who have stayed and like my friends for the most part(besides asshole mentioned above) say they are proud of me all the time. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve ever had this much self esteem and confidence. It makes me emotional even just to think about it.
How did you know? Lol

Hey guys! I just want to say thank you for all your responses! I have read all of them and I appreciate it! It‚Äôs hard to respond to this many though. You guys are awesome and I feel the love which has been so hard without AA. I miss being around sober people. You guys are my tribe. Keep being your awesome selves! IWNDWYT!
That‚Äôs exactly how I am! Like not drinking is not my problem, I can do that. Or if I drink I will definitely drink too much. There‚Äôs no in between.
You can get there! I believe in you!

Ugh yeah. This guy has had a crush on me in the past and he has his own insecurities about drinking like the guy on your date. I think I used to be like that too unfortunately. It took me a stupid long time to finally be like ‚Äúyeah this shit sucks and is a problem.‚Äù But good for you for holding your own! We got this!

That‚Äôs all true. He definitely is projecting. He told me his gf is upset about his drinking so I know he‚Äôs insecure. It still stings but I‚Äôm also not even close to being who I was anymore so it‚Äôs more annoying and less offensive. TY IWNDWYT!
Right! I think he has insecurities about his drinking too and that‚Äôs why he keeps saying stuff like that. Thank you for your response. It gives me insight! IWNDWYT!
Omg yes and thank you! Same douche that told me when I quit that I‚Äôm more fun when I‚Äôm drunk.  What an ass. IWNDWYT!!

I want one! Do you happen to know where your friend got it?!
Edit: found it! So cool!
I want a print of this!
Bpd^2
That‚Äôs a great name!
Yo a small percentage of crazy people stormed the Capital. Most people in Michigan didn‚Äôt support that at all.
That‚Äôs a good idea. I‚Äôll just toast it with some cheese. Problem solved!

Thank you! I sure think I do now. Definitely not when I was drinking. I could barely function. Now it feels like anything is possible. Maybe you‚Äôll see me make a post in fours years graduating! I wish you the best! Congrats again!

I‚Äôm 28 now, no degree, 107 days sober. You truly give me hope. I either want to be a psychologist or psychiatrist. I‚Äôm starting with one class this summer and going from there. Thank you for sharing and congrats to your degree and beautiful life! IWNDWYT!
Those look like morning star nugs
This is so beautiful!‚ù§Ô∏è
I‚Äôve not dated people over that.

Whoa other guy, I didn‚Äôt say 2021 but the outcry of people expecting businesses to be open after only two months during a global pandemic is pretty unreasonable. We don‚Äôt even have enough tests running to kind of expect the economy to open up and that‚Äôs coming from Dr. Fauci.

Whoa buddy, I didn‚Äôt cause a fucking global pandemic first of all secondly, there‚Äôs a lot more social distancing to be had in those businesses. Calm down. We‚Äôre all just being realistic. Ventilation is a problem in restaurants and social distancing. I work in the restaurant industry and am not too happy either but that‚Äôs just the facts.
I don‚Äôt know why people are getting downvoted for being realistic. It‚Äôs just something that may have to be accepted even though we would love for these places to be open again.
Well they look amazing! Thanks for the recipe!
I need a recipe!
I will have to check that out! I don‚Äôt usually use Instagram but I will give it a go. Thank you for the suggestion as well!
I love it!! I just got my critter nation last night and I‚Äôm looking for inspiration! Thank you for your comment!
But what‚Äôs nips?

Hi thank you! I‚Äôm 28. I have pretty clear non oily skin. When I use powders my skin looks really dry so my friends usually use like liquid stuff. I‚Äôve never really done my own makeup and don‚Äôt even know where to start but it really interests me and now I have plenty of time right now! I‚Äôm also very pale with blue tones. Does that help? Thank you so much!

I don‚Äôt know why your newest comment got deleted. It wasn‚Äôt soliciting but anyway, waking up to your comment and reading that comment right now is really helpful. I was obviously feeling hopeless but this morning I‚Äôve been setting 6-8 hour alarms on my phone to control when I can take my next dose. Your advice has helped. Especially about deciding how much anxiety I can handle. I will definitely try being aware of what kind of discomfort constitutes taking the med. thank you again.
Thanks. I‚Äôll look into that method. I think I‚Äôm just really scared.

I‚Äôve tried to cold turkey it and have ended up in the ER from severe withdrawal feelings. I wish I could just say no more. I think I‚Äôm going to call my doctor about going into medical detox. I know everyone is different. I just personally can‚Äôt manage tapering on my own or quitting on my own. I feel really ashamed but it‚Äôs a really easy substance to get physically dependent on.

Thank you. I‚Äôm also in AA 74 days sober and my sponsor went into medical detox for Xanax so she had a lot of insight on it. I talked with my doctor 4 days ago about tapering and I‚Äôm just having the worst time trying and beating myself up. I know it‚Äôs only been 4 days and my sponsor has also said that this drug is just really hard to get off. I‚Äôm thinking of doing a medical detox and just being done with it. I can‚Äôt live being dependent on a drug anymore. I‚Äôll continue to try to taper this month but if I can‚Äôt manage to get down a dose by the end of the end of this monthly script then I want to surrender to detox. That feeling of running out and hands shaking, trembling, waves of intense anxiety is the worst. This is much harder than alcohol. Thank you for your response.
I picked dark blue. Never had a fair shot:(

I‚Äôm only 28 but in a similar position. I didn‚Äôt have parents and couldn‚Äôt afford insurance right from the start of turning 18. I have so much medical debt that I can‚Äôt get approved for anything credit. It really sucks. I have had to earn a car, an apartment, a phone all not relying on my credit score and paying cash outright for everything. My medical debt is in the 20k‚Äôs..
Thank you so much!

It‚Äôs okay. I‚Äôve heard people asking for help get downvotes all the time. Idk why this community is like that but oh well. Also on the shoes! I asked a family member and they ordered them for me and chef said my purple crocs will be fine for one day but I really really appreciate you offering up shoes. That was so kind! Maybe someone else will need them:)
Let me keep you updated after my orientation! Thank you!
Thank you! I wish those came in my size. I‚Äôm a female size 7-7.5.
Oh and yes, it is for kitchen work!

Let me keep you updated! Thank you for the offer. I go in for orientation today and I want to see if that will work for temporary. I have purple crocs but it‚Äôs higher end so I just assumed that I would need black. I‚Äôll give you an update today for sure! Thank you so much!
Thank youüòä‚ù§Ô∏è
Do you have an online site?
Me too! That‚Äôs why I had to post mine! It‚Äôs so motivating to see people shine!
My best friend was playing with my hair the other day and saying she thought it felt healthier! Thank you!
Thank you! It definitely does feel better everyday and does help me to keep going!!
Thank you!!! I feel fab!
Thank you so much! You can do this, one day at a time! IWNDWYT!
Thank you! I feel so much more secure in my looks in a physical and mental sense! IWNDWYT!
It was between that or anonymous
Thank you! So happy to be a rat mama again!

Lolol. My bf who named Pizza almost named her lasagna! I named the middle one Gryla after Christmas folklore because they were born on the solstice and I love witchy things! We thought about Taco too because tacos are my favorite food! I really like the name Dahlia but the bf and I said we have to come up with her name together. I love all the suggestions though!!
I know! I love them!

Thank you. This is a great response. That‚Äôs exactly what I‚Äôm doing is going through a women‚Äôs group. I‚Äôm using an advocate and she is amazing. I should utilize their hotline though, I didn‚Äôt think about that.
Oh okay. I‚Äôll have to look at their menu. I love Japanese. I‚Äôve been to like sansu and AI. I really like omi in EL. I usually just stick with sushi though usually.

Nice, I haven‚Äôt been there. Yeah, it‚Äôs hard to find like healthy fast and balanced options around here. Horrocks has a hot bar and salad bar too if you‚Äôre looking for fast and convenient. They have a ton of options to choose from
Yeah, milk can be a problem too. Do you like Mediterranean food? Aladdin‚Äôs has a lot of healthy options that include veggies and leaner meats and little dairy.
Meat really does mess up your digestive tract though...
Ooh but what murder podcast are you listening to?
Do you have any idea of what was in it? That would be helpful
I usually do it for cacio e pepe
Sometimes I use ramen because I like the saltier taste? Not necessarily because of price as pasta is cheap anyway

Thank you for the suggestions. I‚Äôm going to clean out my cage and rearrange my apartment today to see where my cage fits best. It‚Äôs a small pet cage. I think it was last used for guinea pigs but the spacing is the same as my old cage it‚Äôs just longer and not as tall. I‚Äôd like to invest in something larger in the future so they have more play room. Fleece is a great idea. I was going to make some of those little tie blankets for them and I‚Äôll look into the space pod idea. My old girls loved their little wooden house and I make hammocks out of old t shirts. My old girls would chew through the nice ones easily so I just started making them myself. I‚Äôm going to amazon a foraging wheel now. Thanks!
Oh wow! Thank you! I just registered!

AA is helping me so much. I have been reading the big book everyday and the 12 and 12 and going to meetings. With being unemployed I‚Äôm actually taking the time to take care of myself like really actually trying and I‚Äôm loving the program and the people!
Thank you so much!! It‚Äôs gift enough really. I feel so much better and I‚Äôm making the proper amends with those I hurt. It has been a very fulfilling month!
Been sober for 32 days. Unemployed seeking a job with high hopes. A pizza would be nice to celebrate my sobriety!
Just for today, exactly. I always get tripped up in anniversaries
Thank you friend, cheers to your favorite morning drink! I just made a coffee. IWNDWY ever either. Happy Valentine‚Äôs Day also!!

I know. I agree with you that it is the best. Idk why but nothing otc works. I used to run to excedrin. Always had it on hand but now I take it and nothing. I tried the cbd in combination with ibuprofen though and that did help which surprised me. I have been on stuff for my headaches through my doctor too. Going to go in for migraines. He put me on amitryptaline(not sure how to spell) and that made me feel really weird. I have been getting headaches once a week since I quit drinking. Idk if it‚Äôs not eating enough, not enough sugar, too much caffeine, not drinking enough water. I‚Äôm trying to lower my caffeine intake, up my water intake, eat before I realize I‚Äôm starving, and eating like small candy sometimes because maybe my body was used to sugar from booze. I‚Äôm just working on my body and hopping that helps.
It used to work but it just doesn‚Äôt anymore.
I took excedrin and it didn‚Äôt help. It used to but it doesn‚Äôt anymore for me and just makes me jittery now
Thanks for your input. New to all of this was going to start reading some more of the big book tonight but may also read tradition five in the 12 and 12 now also
Thanks! That‚Äôs some good insight. I am using it for completely different reasons than I used alcohol. Not even kind of the same. Great perspective! That helped me a lot.

Thank you. I just asked my sponsor too and she said since it‚Äôs not mind altering and I‚Äôm using it as a pain treatment she doesn‚Äôt see a problem with it. My sponsor due to my addictive personality to other substances said she didn‚Äôt think I should use thc anymore as it‚Äôs mind altering so I‚Äôm just concerned and confused.
I feel personally attacked. My boyfriend says no to Taco Bell everyday
I‚Äôm sorry:( down about anything in particular?
Yay! Hope we make it a year together! And then beyond!
Thanks. I started despicable me and I‚Äôm working on collage stuff
Thank you! I try to reach out when I need it!
Sounds like movies and art therapy for me tonight!
Thank you kind stranger!
No drinking for me! Sticking to my tea tonight!
I wish mine were later. On the weekdays they all seem to end at 8.
Hiii. Thank you for answering my post.

I hope so too. I was driving around today and saw five accidents and no salt trucks so I thought better to stay home. It‚Äôs just been a build up of things. I feel under appreciated by my boyfriend, my best friend tried to commit suicide this weekend and so I met her at the bus station last minute on Tuesday to send her off to rehab. My other best friend called in a panic last night telling me that her new boyfriend has been slowly building up abusing her and she wants my help kicking him out of her place. My dad is a severe alcoholic dying of cirrosis and he needed my help this week but he didn‚Äôt even thank me for helping him. It‚Äôs literally just a whole bunch of shit at once. And I‚Äôm newly sober, 23 days. I just feel like I over extended my helping hand this week and haven‚Äôt taken care of myself. I‚Äôm about to go do some artwork and watch tv to get myself out of these feelings. Sorry for the word vomit.
Yes! And even still you have to check. Swear to god every other time I go there‚Äôs still bacon in it and they have to remake it.
Yesss. I love apps. I am not a healthy vegetarian.
Oh! Also helpful I go for their spinach dip, quesadilla without bacon, or mozzarella sticks now. They really don‚Äôt have vegetarian options.
